title: WEDNESDAY - Push for the playoffs 2020
itunes:title: WEDNESDAY - Push for the playoffs 2020
description:
The final week of the regular season (0:07) sees 11 teams still fighting for a chance to reach the postseason, we'll take a look at some of the scenarios. Pittsburgh will be without Ben Roethlisberger (1:14) as Kyle Rudolph gets the start against the Browns. Washington head coach Ron Rivera (2:31) talks about the decision to waive quarterback Dwayne Haskins, The Rams (3:07) making some roster moves as they could be without their top wide receiver when they take on the Cardinals. Plus, the Bills and Browns (3:43) could be short-handed for their Week 17 matchups

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
